section.text: wants you to investigate the mysterious signal.
It's fried! Maybe the [object=mechanic] can fix it...
Ouch! The com device is burning hot!
It's fried... I wonder how that happened.
I should head back home and see if the [object=mechanic] can fix it...
Your com device is fried? How is that possible?!

It seems there was a signal so strong that it fried the comm device! I've used the data it collected before breaking to pinpoint the origin of the signal! You should head over to that system and find out what caused the signal!
You have interfered with the ecosystem of this planet. This is your [global=uefd_warning] warning.
You have interfered with the ecosystem of this planet. This is your [global=uefd_warning] and last warning.

It seems there was a signal so strong that it fried the comm device! I've used the data it collected before breaking to pinpoint the origin of the signal! You should head over to that system and find out what caused the signal!
M-type star 1000 light years from Earth. 2 confirmed exoplanets.
